Text: RE Thursday General Counsel Call Cc Thanks for the input Rob Julia has already gone through the Enron Europe and Enron Wind interview processes She speaks excellent English as well as German In addition to myself and Chris Wood she was interviewed by an Enron Wind German lawyer who has left and she is replacing an Enron Corp German lawyer and by a German lawyer from Punder The feedback is unanimously positive I think I have run all of the interview traps in Europe and am confident that she will be a real asset to our department and to the Enron Wind Europe team

Thursday General Counsel Call Cc I will be traveling tomorrow morning and will be unable to participate on the call If you have any questions or concerns I can be reached on my cell phone tomorrow afternoon and I will be in the office on Friday I hope all is well
